column2: Hello and welcome to CTFO, a new, 100% anonymous place for relationship advice. You're an expert, right? Good. Swipe this card to the right.
By swiping to the right, you're advising the author to Chill The F*ck Out. The left swipe says That's F*cked Up. Swipe up to skip the card.
Also, you can recall the last card by swiping down. Try it now!
You can star the cards you like, report bad ones, and of course make your own. You'll discover the rest as you go.
That's it for a quick intro. Make sure to star this card now so that you can come back to it later: its comments work as the app's FAQ.
